comments.raw_text:

On 8.0 I get:

Line: 0

The function name is different.

comments.text: j.j. what is the dependence here on bug 674437? The file shown in the error console does not contain the named function. Is xpath applied to the file and the warning gets output in the console because xpath internal function uses the function?
